Description:
Please Note: This event will not be live streamed, but users can watch the documentary by visiting www.aacr.org/baselga</br></br>
Past AACR President José Baselga, MD, PhD, FAACR worked tirelessly for decades as a researcher, clinician and leader to improve the lives of patients and to advance the field of oncology. He was a major force in the development of molecularly targeted therapies and in making precision cancer medicine a reality for patients. One year after his untimely passing, join us to commemorate José and keep his legacy alive with a special screening of the new documentary “José Baselga: Cancer's Fiercest Opponent.” </br></br>
Drinks, snacks, and refreshments will be served. Opening remarks will be provided by Margaret Foti, PhD, MD (hc), chief executive officer of the AACR, and Susan Galbraith, PhD, MD, Executive Vice-President, Oncology R&D at AstraZeneca and an AACR Board Member.
Location: New Orleans Theater C, Convention Center

Title: Special Documentary Screening: "Jose Baselga: Cancer's Fiercest Opponent"
